module: Module-level comment: The ROM_cb5 module implements a 16-entry read-only memory (ROM) storing 32-bit values accessed via a 4-bit address input (`addr`). It outputs the stored value corresponding to the address on `dataout`. Internally, it uses a 32-bit register array `cb5` initialized with predefined values, and the selected value is dynamically retrieved from this array using `addr`, providing constant data for digital system applications.
